body_html:
Ok, so the question which channel (email vs. social media vs. whatever) should be used to ping the coaches again to update their profile and availability can be postponed in my opinion - not super necessary to have this in place right away.

For the open question

check for available vs. unavailable

I would say, there's no huge difference on the technical side. So if we start with the available approach™ and find out later that "unavailable" would have been a better idea, I'm pretty sure this can be changed within a few simple commits.

Therefore my suggestion to not block @branquinhoaa and @juuh42dias: let's go for the available approach™ for now. It appears slightly easier to understand and all the wording around it a bit more "obvious" then in the other case - therefore I'd consider it the easier approach and good enough for a beginning.

Ok, so the question which channel (email vs. social media vs. whatever) should be used to ping the coaches again to update their profile and availability can be postponed in my opinion - not super necessary to have this in place right away.

For the open question
> check for available vs. unavailable

I would say, there's no huge difference on the technical side. So if we start with **the available approach™** and find out later that "unavailable" would have been a better idea, I'm pretty sure this can be changed within a few simple commits.

Therefore my suggestion to not block @branquinhoaa and @juuh42dias: let's go for **the available approach™** for now. It appears slightly easier to understand and all the wording around it a bit more "obvious" then in the other case - therefore I'd consider it the easier approach and good enough for a beginning.
